# fontSize

**Instance Property**

The font size used to render the receiver’s text. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var fontSize: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to 36.0.

The `fontSize` property is only used when the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATextLayer/string] property is not an `NSAttributedString`.



## Text Visual Properties

- **font**: The font used to render the receiver’s text.
- **foregroundColor**: The color used to render the receiver’s text. Animatable.
- **allowsFontSubpixelQuantization**: Determines whether to allow subpixel quantization for the graphics context used for text rendering.
